title: hosting open-source face
content:
To any/all that have worked on an open-source typeface, where did you host the source files? What was your experience?

The only one I'm familiar with is github (which hosts EB Garamond) but I'd like to know about other options specifically for the context of working in font design.
author: ChristTrekker

comments.content: SFDir or UFO sources in Mercurial or Git, using Github, Bitbucket or Gitorious, are all pretty much the same... I expect most projects to use UFO on Github in the near future, and I'm contributing to the [https://github.com/xen/fontbakery/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417074323/https:/github.com/xen/fontbakery/ "https://github.com/xen/fontbakery/") project to make such projects like Travis-CL :)
